TextView.android:text:
- You get 50 points when you Sign up.

 - You get points for liking other user's facebook page

 - You can give your points to other users for them liking your page

 - You can decide how much points(10/15/20/25pts) to be given to another user for liking your page

 - Pages of users who give more amount of points will be listed at the top of the list

 - You are more likely to get more number of likes if you set maximum points(25pts) for liking your page

 - When you like another user's page you get points and when other user likes your page your points reduces(other user gets that point)

 - Through this way, these points are circulated among users and in effect every user get likes for their page

 - You will stop getting likes when your points are exhausted. Earn more and more points to continue getting more and more likes to your page
